Class UITextInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • Container
      • UITextInput

  • class UITextInput
extends Container
    Text input class that extends the container class, allows the user to input text via the keyboard

        x - the x coordinate of the text input

                   double y,
                   double width,
                   double height,
                   java.awt.Image texture,
                   int maxLength)
        Text input constructor
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the text input
        y - the y coordinate of the text input
        width - the width of the text input
        height - the height of the text input
        texture - the texture to be rendered
        maxLength - the maximum number of characters the text input can contain
